<h1>RYZEN PRE-ORDER DETAILS</h1>
_____________________

Below, we will cover all the details regarding this promotion. If you have any additional questions, please check our replies on this thread and if the question has not been answered, feel free to ask.

**HOW IT WORKS.** _General Explanation_

Place an order. You may pay for it to reserve/prioritize your spot. If you do not want to pay for it yet, you can comment here with your order ID per the instructions above, and it will also be added to a list of beta testers. We will process non-paid beta test services in the order they are received, while supplies last. There will be a total of 3,000 positions at this time, so these will be cut off for the first phase of expansion after approximately that quantity of comments. More positions may be added.

**ETA/TIMELINE.** _Guaranteed And Estimated Timeframes_

All paid Los Angeles orders will be activated by February 28, 2021 or sooner. All paid Amsterdam orders will be activated by March 31st, 2021 or sooner. Any other location (if offered due to high demand, paid only) will be guaranteed by April 30th, 2021. All paid Ryzen orders in Los Angeles will receive a PLACEHOLDER service free of charge, meaning you will have a service on current hardware for the time being as a courtesy. No guarantees are provided on this placeholder. For non-paid orders, there is no timeline or guarantee although it will fall in line with/after the paid orders. We will provide at least [1] week notice before terminating placeholder & beta test services. There's no set period of time for the duration of beta test. It will most likely last at least several weeks.

By the estimated timeframes, we will at least have an automated system set up to request a refund if we miss the target. You can request a refund via this button, or chose to wait longer. Please do not contact us for order status; we will not be able to update you and the ticket will most likely be closed without a response. We will only provide updates on this thread.

**LOCATIONS AVAILABLE.** _Initial Locations Offered_

We will allow you to place an order, selecting either Los Angeles or Amsterdam. Please note, Amsterdam may have further delays related to the added time for shipping & customs. You may comment here with your paid order ID and a preferred primary location. This will count as a vote toward that location and if that location has enough support we may provide your service on that location, with a modified guaranteed due date of April 30th, 2021. Otherwise, it will be on the location selected/available. Only paid orders can vote. 

Use this form to request another location (not guaranteed.)
<pre> LOCATION REQUEST
**Order ID:** [Enter Order ID]
**Preferred Location:** [City, Country]</pre>

Some potential future locations include the following, but feel free to state any location.
* Ashburn, US. Toronto, CA.  Moscow, RU. London, UK. Dallas, US. Miami, US. Tokyo, JP. Sydney, AU. Singapore, SG. Chicago, US. Sao Paulo, BR. Johannesburg, ZA. Mumbai, IN. Taipei, TW. Atlanta, US. 

If you vote for other locations, we recommend checking other votes and use similar formatting.

**AFTER BETA TEST.** _What Will Happen?_

The end of the beta test will be announced, and you will be provided at least one week notice. An invoice will be generated, and it can be paid to continue service at the published price and term or you may "cancel" the service instead to ensure a termination. Published price will be without any additional promotion/coupon for any orders not paid initially, even if coupon was initially utilized. Please note, our billing will proceed as normal which means if you do not have auto payments disabled with a credit/debit card or PayPal account on file then it will auto-renew 72 hours before the invoice due date. If you already paid for the service, then your service duration will begin only after the beta test concludes (so if you paid, you still get the free beta test period.)


<h1>SUPPORT LEVEL</h1>
_______________

The Storage & paid Ryzen packages will have a regular level of support. KVM specials will have limited support. All beta test portion of Ryzen services will have extremely limited support (essential no support) and will have no guarantees whatsoever. For beta tests, use this thread for support. Complimentary placeholder services will have limited support. There are absolutely no guarantees whatsoever on beta test and placeholder services.

**Please remember, the beta test is a beta test. A lot can go wrong, including extended outages. Do not use for important applications. Do not store important data. Do not use in production.**

<h1>REFUNDS</h1>
_________________

There are no refunds for any services on this promotion, unless we miss any specified delivery outline. Even if the package comes with support, it will not qualify for a refund (by default.) Please be absolutely sure you have automatic payments disabled and no credits on file before you place any order, as you will not qualify for a refund even if there was an unintended purchase. Do not refresh checkout pages or press the back button, including at the payment processor’s website; if a page fails at loading, close out.

<h1>AFFILIATES</h1>
_________________

If you are an affiliate, please note that the pre-order packages are NOT eligible for any affiliate payout, but the regular KVM specials are eligible. We cannot pay out affiliate earnings on the pre-orders due to the nature of how they will be created and the timeline. 

<h1>OFFER TERMS/DISCLAIMER</h1>
_________________

We reserve the right to cancel and refund any service and opt not to render it instead (this will usually be reserved in case of major issues with the package or estimated delivery times, typos, or our ability to deliver the product should it be sold out.) All promotion/coupon codes for this offer are one-time use only per household, and non-recurring. See "REFUNDS" section above for the refund terms. 

Please do not contact our live chat or sales department with questions in regards to this sale. We may rate limit or block special-related requests. Please anticipate your service to potentially not be functional for a few days before you can contact us for a resolution. If you have any questions, please post them on this thread. We apologize for any errors/typos within this offer.

**Please also avoid doing the following:**

* Making more than one account (may cause major problems.)
* Making more than one ticket (will slow down the process for everyone.)
* Selling your outside of our transfer process (may cause major problems.)
* Requesting e-mail changes (we cannot process these for specials at this time.)
* Locking yourself out (2FA, we can't deal with this high quantity of requests.)

The promotion codes for the additional one-time discounts are set to expire by January 23rd, 2021.

<h1>BETA TEST FEEDBACK</h1>
_________________

We will expect some level of feedback from beta testers. We may send you communication/polls, message you on LET, or gather feedback here in some way. For Alpha testers (in a previous thread) you will receive your services first and we will expect a greater level of feedback. If you have issues, please post on this thread only and please do not create a ticket, unless you are asked to create a ticket.
